Articles.Content: This has to do with the forum. Maybe its just my system, but I seem to be getting a Verizon Fios popup every time I click on a thread now. And I use Comcast.
The forums don't serve popups as far as I know, just a few banner ads, I think you are overdue a virus scan :/
Check for adware, as well. Especially check through browser plugins and extensions; sometimes adware or viruses will hide in there.
